head.title: Remove {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to delete specific pages from {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Easily manage PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Remove pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} apps with powerful document processing capabilities, including removing pages from {{FileFormatUp}} files.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is an advanced document processing tool supporting over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It offers a range of features such as merging, splitting, extracting, reordering, swapping, and deleting pages to optimize document management.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document processing
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a wide range of features, enabling efficient handling of over 50 commonly used business file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge multiple file types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and archives with flexible options for precise merging.

feature_2.title: Organize document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to structure documents efficiently.

feature_3.title: Customize page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages at any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations as needed.

feature_4.title: Extract pages into separate documents
feature_4.content: Select and save specific pages as independent files for better document organization.

formats.title: Remove pages from various file formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 document formats, allowing quick and easy modifications.

operations.title: Core features
operations.description: Discover additional capabilities of our solution.

examples.comment_2: Specify the page number(s) to be removed

content.title: With [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}), you can easily delete pages from {{FileFormatUp}} files. Add document management functionality to your {{EnvName}} applications effortlessly.

code_1.title: How to remove all even pages
code_1.content: Learn how to delete even-numbered pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
